Quote: Let us pick up our books and our pens, they are the most powerful weapons."Malala Yousafzai, the schoolgirl who was shot in the head by the Taliban for wanting an education and survived, in her keynote speech to the United Nations, 12th July 2013.
Author: Malala Yousafzai,  I Am Malala: The Girl Who Stood Up for Education and Was Shot by the Taliban
